verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bind us together, Lord.
Bind us together,
with cords that
cannot be broken.
Bind us together, Lord.
Bind us together,
Bind us together with love.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is only one God,
There is only one King
There is only one Body,
That is why we sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Made for the glory of God,
Purchased by His precious Son
Born with the right
to be clean,
For Jesus the victory
has won.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are the family of God
We are the promised divine
We are God's chosen desire
We are the glorious new wine.
